io.github.kagznjenga

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kagznjenga.Product
      • io.github.kagznjenga.AudioPlayer

  • public class AudioPlayer
extends Product
    The AudioPlayer class is a template for all audio objects and it inherits from the product class which implements the MultiMediaControl interface.
